title: Worlds In Game Icon use ?
body: So I haven't bought any team icon for 2015 yet but because flashing my favorite team would be awesome I've been considering it. My only question is, once worlds is over will we be able to still flash the team icon or is it now just a summoner icon afterwards ? If anyone could help me out on this that would be great :)  {{item:2052}}

replies.body:
Ah, I see that you're interested in representing your team while in-game! The 2015 Worlds Championship Team Icons will only have the in-game animations available temporarily. You can find more information about it here:

- http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/welcome-worlds-shop

Specifically here:

> If you have a World Championship Team icon equipped during Worlds month, you can display a **special in-game emote** of your teamâ€™s logo by activating the mastery emote binding. After Patch 5.21, the emotes will retire as we clean up the confetti, but the icons will stick around.
Why remove the in game effect? I don't see the harm in letting them remain. It's pretty cool, and it's actually why I bought my icon in the first place.
